description:
Core IPC and dialog access for settings and overlay windows.

core:default grants plugin:event|listen, plugin:event|unlisten, plugin:event|emit,
and all other Tauri core plugin commands.  Without it, listen() from
@tauri-apps/api/event is denied by the ACL with "Command plugin:event|listen
not allowed by ACL" (confirmed in v1.0.2 coach.log).

dialog:default grants the file open/save dialogs used by the log folder picker.

NOTE: global-shortcut:default is intentionally omitted.  The plugin is
initialised via Builder::new().with_handler() rather than init(), which does not
register the global-shortcut:default permission bundle; including it caused a
process::abort() (0xc0000409) at startup in v1.0.1.  The overlay toggle hotkey
is fully handled in Rust — no frontend invokes the global-shortcut plugin.

NOTE: No $schema field — gen/schemas/desktop-schema.json is generated only by a
local `tauri build` and is never committed to this repository.
